member.name: T:YAF.Controls.DataPanel
member.summary: Web control which provides a panel control as a collapsible/expandable control container. The control provides a panel title and action link, either/both may provide the expand/collapse action as a hot-link.
member.remarks: The control is used by registering the library in the Visual Studio Toolbox, and then dragging it onto the ASP.NET form. For the control to be truly expandable/collapsible, the style tag 'POSITION: absolute' should be removed from the HTML control definition, or else the control should be place in another control such as a table.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._dataPanelScript
member.summary: Name of the script block to control the collapsing/expanding of the control.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._allowTitleExpandCollapse
member.summary: The constant string "AllowTitleExpandCollapse".
member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the object.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._collapsed
member.summary: The constant string "Collapsed".
member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the ViewState object.

member.summary: The constant string "Collapsible".
member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the ViewState object.

member.summary: The constant string "CollapseImageUrl".
member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the ViewState object.

member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the ViewState object.

member.summary: The constant string "TitleText".
member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the ViewState object.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.RegisterControlScript
member.summary: Method to extract the script block text from the control resources and register it as a client script block.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._controlTable
member.summary: The layout table element for the control.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._headerRow
member.summary: The header row element for the control.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._titleCell
member.summary: The header title cell element for the control.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._actionCell
member.summary: The cell element that contains the expand/collapse action link or image for the control.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._contentRow
member.summary: The row element for the user content controls.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._contentCell
member.summary: The cell element for the user content panel.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._headerPanel
member.summary: The header panel element that is contained by the the header row element.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._titleLink
member.summary: The title hyperlink element of the control.
member.remarks: This link is active only if the property is true.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._actionLink
member.summary: The action hyperlink element of the control.
member.remarks: This link is active only if the is false.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._currentState
member.summary: Hidden input field which is set by the client script to indicate if the control has been expanded or collapsed by the user.
member.remarks: If the control is collapsed, the value of this field is "true" (string). If the control is expanded, the value of this field is "false" (string).

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor.
member.remarks: If the Width of the control is not set, the value of '100%' is set as default.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._hideActionExpandCollapse
member.summary: The constant string "HideActionExpandCollapse".
member.remarks: This value is the key for the property state parameter in the ViewState object.

member.name: F:YAF.Controls.DataPanel._titleStyle
member.summary: The member used for the property.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.HtmlColorString(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Converts a object to an HTML compliant string.

members.member:
Applies a object to an object.
object to apply to.
The object to apply.
The properties are converted to the object attributes.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.PanelUrl(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates the expand/collapse hyper-links for the control.
member.param: True if images are used in the action link (right-hand side of the control). Otherwise false.
True if the title is a link (left-hand side of the control). Otherwise false.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.UpdateControlsState
member.summary: Updates the control appearance state based on the various properties of the control.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.CreateControlComponents
member.summary: Creates the control sub-components of the control.
member.remarks:
Sets the user container object render delegate as the method using the
SetRenderMethodDelegate method. This allows the content (this panel control) to be rendered as a child object of the container.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.RenderPanelContent(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter,System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Delegate member called when the is to be rendered.
member.param: HTML writer object to render to.
member.remarks: This control (DataPanel) contents are rendered using the RenderContents method. This method renders all the child controls added to the DataPanel control during design time.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.SetControlHierarchy
member.summary: Sets the parent/child control relationships for all child controls in this composite control.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.CreateChildControls
member.summary: Overrides the method.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the method.
member.param: An object that contains the event data.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.LoadViewState(System.Object)
member.summary: Overrides the method.
member.param: An that represents the control state to be restored.
member.remarks: Loads the state in addition to the base class states.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.SaveViewState
member.summary: Overrides the method.
member.returns: Returns the server control's current view state. If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.remarks: Saves the state in addition to the base class states.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the method.
member.param: The EventArgs object that contains the event data.
member.remarks: The control registers for postback data in this method.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
member.param: The HtmlTextWriter object that receives the server control content.
member.remarks: The control creates an outer panel object that is rendered in this method.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.RaisePostDataChangedEvent
member.summary: This method is required for the implementation.
member.remarks: This method is not implemented as no postback event is required.

member.name: M:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Processes post back data for this control.
member.param: The key identifier for the control.
The collection of all incoming name values.
member.returns: True if the server control's state changes as a result of the post back; otherwise false.

remarks.para: The control sets the property from the value obtained from the hidden input field used to determine the collapsed state and set by script on the client.
This method always returns false, as no event notification is required.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.AllowTitleExpandCollapse
member.summary: Set to true to allow clicking the panel header title to expand/collapse the content panel.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.Collapsed
member.summary: Set to true to collapse the content panel, else false to expand.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.Collapsible
member.summary: Set to true to enable the user content panel to collapse, else false to disable.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.CollapseImageUrl
member.summary: Url of the image to use for the collapse-action link.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.CollapseText
member.summary: Text to use for the collapse-action link.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.ExpandImageUrl
member.summary: Url of the image to use for the expand-action link.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.ExpandText
member.summary: Text to use for the expand-action link.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.HideActionExpandCollapse
member.summary: Set to true to hide the text/image action link which expands or collapses the content panel.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.TitleText
member.summary: Text that will appear on the control title header.
member.remarks: The ViewState object is used to save the value of this property between postbacks.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.TitleStyle
member.summary: Display style of the control title header.
member.remarks: The override is used to save the value of this property between postbacks, while the override is used to restore the value.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.HeaderPanelId
member.summary: Helper property to return the correct control id for the header panel object.

member.name: P:YAF.Controls.DataPanel.CollapsedStateId
member.summary: Helper property to return the correct control id for the hidden input object that holds the control collapsed state string.
